XML Format: ValueSet-valueset-attestationmethod

Raw xml 


<ValueSet xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
  <id value="valueset-attestationmethod"/>
  <text>
    <status value="generated"/>
    <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><h2>VhDir Attestation Method</h2><div><p>This value set includes a codes that describe the relationship between the list of standards defining digital certificates.</p>
</div><p>This value set includes codes from the following code systems:</p><ul><li>Include these codes as defined in <a href="CodeSystem-codesystem-validation.html"><code>http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-validation</code></a><table class="none"><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap"><b>Code</b></td><td><b>Display</b></td></tr><tr><td><a href="CodeSystem-codesystem-validation.html#codesystem-validation-owner">owner</a></td><td>Indicate the element or resource was owner</td><td>Indicates the element or resource was attested to by the individual who owned the data.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="CodeSystem-codesystem-validation.html#codesystem-validation-authrep">authrep</a></td><td>Authorized representative</td><td>Indicates the element or resource was attested to by an individual who was designated to attest by the owner of the data.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="CodeSystem-codesystem-validation.html#codesystem-validation-authint">authint</a></td><td>Authorized intermediary, eg CA Directory</td><td>Indicates the element or resource was attested to by a system (intermediary) that was designated to attest by the owner of the data.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="CodeSystem-codesystem-validation.html#codesystem-validation-non-auth-src">non-auth-src</a></td><td>Non-authorized source</td><td>Indicates the element or resource was attested to by an individual or system that was not deignated to attest by the owner of the data.</td></tr></table></li></ul></div>
  </text>
  <url value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/ValueSet/valueset-attestationmethod"/>
  <version value="0.2.0"/>
  <name value="VhDir Attestation Method"/>
  <title value="VhDir Attestation Method"/>
  <status value="active"/>
  <date value="2018-02-21"/>
  <publisher value="HL7 - TBD"/>
  <contact>
    <telecom>
      <system value="other"/>
      <value value="http://hl7.org/fhir"/>
    </telecom>
  </contact>
  <description
               value="This value set includes a codes that describe the relationship between the list of standards defining digital certificates."/>
  <compose>
    <include>
      <system
              value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-validation"/>
      <concept>
        <code value="owner"/>
      </concept>
      <concept>
        <code value="authrep"/>
      </concept>
      <concept>
        <code value="authint"/>
      </concept>
      <concept>
        <code value="non-auth-src"/>
      </concept>
    </include>
  </compose>
</ValueSet>
